overview: Lance has more than 14 years of marketing communications expertise counselling organizations in the UK, US and Europe on a range of corporate, branding, marketing and public relations issues. Prior to Rosslyn Analytics, he was managing director of WPP-owned Blanc & Otus Europe, where he was responsible for the development and growth of the companyâ€™s presence in the United Kingdom. Previously, worked on behalf of SAP, IBM, CA, Lyris and other technology-driven companies. Lance earned a B.A. in International Relations from Washington College of Maryland.
